subject: RE: [junit] UnsatisfiedLinkError: Native Library  already loaded in another classloader
msgSnippet: ... just some guesses: do you need the thick (oci) driver? Can you use use the thin driver? This will remove the dll-dependency. Have your tried the textui
messageBody:
> UnsatisfiedLinkError: Native Library C:\oracle\ora90\BIN\ocijdbc9.dll
> already loaded in another classloader
...
> Any suggestions or small examples for dealing with this DB/JUnit
> issue?

just some guesses:

do you need the thick (oci) driver? Can you use use the thin driver?
This will remove the dll-dependency.

Have your tried the textui runner?

Bernd

> Thanks
> -Tim
